main event: Cpl Lertis E. Stanfield observed a white object changing colors in Alamogordo, New Mexico on February 25, 1950.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 1 1/2 hours,The object changed colors from white to red and green,The direction of the object's movement was northwest, Cpl Stanfield reported no associated sound with the object and described its light as very brilliant, No physical evidence was found related to the sighting.
witness description: Cpl Lertis E. Stanfield, a member of the 3024th Air Police Squadron
